title: Pre-Selection Yes Or No Warning
body:
*In ranked flex when a teammate bans another teammates pre-selected champ*



divine6666 Five0: DAMNIT
RoamenCota1 P!zda: was probably an accident
RoamenCota1 P!zda: i wish they had a feature that would ask you after telling you someone on your team would get it
RoamenCota1 P!zda: we should submit that request on the forum..
divine6666 Five0: yeah be nice

replies.body: I got someone to ban morde recently by accidentally hovering him as ADC.
It's already in motion my friend. They're working on it.
